document.full_text: veteran reporter sergei topol was beaten up in central moscow wednesday as he was leaving his flat, police said, underlining russia's position as one of the most dangerous places in the world for journalists.
document.title: veteran russian journalist beaten in moscow
lines_and_colors: veteran reporter sergei topol was beaten up in central moscow wednesday as he was leaving his flat, police said, underlining russia's position as one of the most dangerous places in the world for journalists.
